title: Cozy Autumn Afternoon

diffuser.notes: Adjust to desired strength; enjoy the aroma!

spray_optional.note: Shake well before use; use in well-ventilated spaces.

why_it_works: Frankincense promotes relaxation, while Cinnamon warms the senses. Orange adds a hint of autumnal brightness.
safety: Avoid eyes/mucosa; keep from children & pets.
Consult a professional if pregnant, nursing, or under care.
